cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration validation errors, potentially leading to system startup failures or undefined logging behavior.

du.explanation_en: Setting Ta4 timing parameters to out-of-range values [999, 999] will cause timing misalignment in the front-haul interface, leading to synchronization failures, degraded performance, or connection drops between DU and RU.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Ta4 定時參數設定為超出範圍的值 [999, 999] 會導致前傳介面的定時錯位，造成同步失敗、效能下降或 DU 與 RU 之間的連接中斷。
